info.title: SuperHero Search
info.description: An API to get information about superheroes.
info.x-long-description:
This API returns all the information available about a superhero. Search using hero name, real name, or a unique id.

New regex based search added, premium users get unlimited results while free users get 5.

TOO EXPENSIVE? Feel free to drop me a DM twitter.com/thewritingdev

parameters.name: hero
parameters.description: The name or superhero name of the hero

get.description: This endpoint searches through our superhero database
